name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes: **Note:** The intrinsic muscles of tongue are four paired muscles within the tongue which control its shape.  The extrinsic muscles originate from structures outside the tongue and control its positioning. The extrinsic muscles are distant for Summary Stage.
footnotes:
\## Considered regional in Historic Stage
\### Considered distant in Historic Stage
\*** Considered distant in 1977 Summary Staging Guide
